resources.string: You can set up Wi-Fi calling using the mobile network, but you’ll need to turn on Wi-Fi and connect to a network to use this feature.
Please contact your operator to enable Wi-Fi calling.
We could not find the address that you entered because the street address could not be found, or the city, country or postcode may not be correct.
If your city, country and postcode are not correct tap %1$s, otherwise tap %2$s.
We could not find the address that you entered:
Unable to update the current emergency address at this time. Please try again later.

IMPORTANT - EMERGENCY 911 ADDRESS REQUIRED" To turn on Wi-Fi Calling, enter the US address to which you would like the emergency services to be sent if you call 911. You can go to Settings and change this address at any time. It is very important to update this address whenever you change your location."

WARNINGS – EMERGENCY 999 CALL LIMITATIONS" When calling 999, always tell the operator where you are. Your 999 call will go over Wi-Fi only if the mobile network is unavailable. 999 call made over Wi-Fi may be delayed or unsuccessful; for example, if the 999 system doesn't recognise the address, electrical power is out or your Wi-Fi connection isn't working. Emergency services will be sent to the address you provided above, so please update it as you change locations."
The address entered could not be validated by Emergency Service Providers.
Are you sure that you want to use this address in case of an emergency?
The city, county or postcode that you entered may not be correct.
Please check the address and try again.

"Wi-Fi Calling lets you to make calls using Wi-Fi when the mobile network is not available.
To set up Wi-Fi Calling, you will need to enter a US address. This address will be used by emergency services in your location if you make an emergency (911) call over Wi-Fi from this phone within the US.
We recommend that you change this address when you make calls using a different Wi-Fi network so that your location information is accurate. You can change your location at any time by going to Wi-Fi Calling settings menu."
Unable to activate Wi-Fi calling. Please try again later.
